Package com.niebo.project

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
com.niebo.project.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, com.badlogic.gdx.Input.TextInputListener
public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Input.TextInputListener
Klasa gracza, przechowuje metody takie, jak zapisywanie i wczytywanie gry, dodawanie graczowi planet.
